thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2nd time staying here
thread.title_full: 2nd time staying here - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Renae M
title: 2nd time staying here
text:
I really enjoy this hotel. The staff is prompt and very helpful, the proximity to the metro and shopping areas is fantastic, it is surrounded by nightlife, the rooms are clean and spacious, the beds are comfortable. Highly recommend
The only thing I would change is adding a darker curtain for the shower. I was traveling with my mom and the curtain was sheer so it felt very awkward when we had to shower as there was no privacy.
Room Tip: go for the larger room with the balcony. See more room tips
